text: Hannelore Hoger (20 August 1942 â€“ 21 December 2024) was a German actress and theatre director. She was born in Hamburg, Germany. She was known for playing the lead character in the television series Bella Block. She was also known for playing detective Charlotte Burg in the television series Die Drei. Hoger died on 21 December 2024 in Hamburg at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:German theatre directors Category:Actors from Hamburg
title: Hannelore Hoger
